    • createLogger

      protected static org.slf4j.Logger createLogger(String name)
      Static method - create and register a logger with a certain name
      Parameters:
      name - - the name of the logger
      Returns:
      the logger instance

    • createLogger

      protected static org.slf4j.Logger createLogger(org.slf4j.Logger base, String subLogger)
      Static method - create a sublogger of existing logger. Note. The base parameter is intentionally defined as Object, so it could be anything that has toString() method returning a name.
      Parameters:
      base - - existing Logger or Logger name
      subLogger - - a subname to be concatenated with a period delimiter
      Returns:
      the logger instance
